title: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content: do you believe that heavy metal is satanic?Rorie

title: Re: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content:
Of course not. There are a lot of musicians who enjoy metal, and lots of listeners who enjoy it. Many of these people are Christain, Athiest, Buddhist, Muslim or any one of a number of religions. I'm sure there are plenty of Satanists who like heavy metal, but there are probably a lot of Satanists who like a good burger and fries too. No one's about to call those Satanic.________________

title: Re: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content:
Yeah, surely there are some heavy metalists who are satan worshippers or something, but I don't think music itself is anything else than just.. music. However I still wouldn't listen to songs that praise some devils or such. But, I hope/guess there are many bands that sing about other themes. I don't know, heavy metal isn't my kind of music. title: Re: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content: Hell no, sometimes it's the only thing that keeps me (relatively) sane. I don't get how people can restrict themselves to certain genres of music. My taste changes with my mood. Perhaps some of my moods are satanic.

content: does anyone think heavy metal is still satanic, even if 1 or more members follow a religion?Rorie

title: Re: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content:
No.

As somebody said before, music is music. This is just like impressionist paintings, they don't necessarily have something to do with the author's personality, intentions, etc., etc. You can imagine anything, etc, etc.

So heavy metal isn't satanism.------------------

title: Re: Heavy Metal, Satanic?
content:
No, there are no backward messages in heavy metal.

...

Well, there are in some songs, but they're not really hidden. You can clearly hear the person's voice being played backwards, and they're not satanic.

And no, there are not certain types of music that are banned over here. Free speech and whatnot. If anything, I would expect punk to be banned, considering the number of anarchist/anti-American punk bands out there."A man is the less likely to become great the more he is dominated by reason: few can achieve greatness - and none in art - if they are not dominated by illusion."
--Mr. Doctor
